content: this legal text summarizes a case involving two parties mr bm and mr bg who are disputing the division of assets the assets in question are two apartments located in castelfidardo the first apartment is on the ground floor and includes a cellar exclusive courtyard attic and garage the second apartment is on the first floor and also includes a courtyard attic and garage the cadastral income for both apartments is specified the parties have reached an agreement to divide the assets into two shares mr bm will receive the firstfloor apartment valued at €61000 while mr bg will receive the ground floor apartment also valued at €61000 the legal document confirms this agreement and provides all the necessary details of the properties involved
